short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promote environmental awareness and sustainable practices with a new tip every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EcoTab is a useful and engaging Chrome extension that helps you develop eco-friendly habits and increase environmental awareness. With daily relevant tips, EcoTab empowers you to make a positive impact on our planet. Each time you open a new tab or click on the extension icon, you'll discover a new eco-friendly tip, sourced from a large list. Also, save your favorite tips as images for quick reference. So, what are you waiting for, install EcoTab today and embark on a journey towards a greener, more sustainable lifestyle.
